headline: Governor DeWine Announces Super Bowl Sunday as Cincinnati Bengals Day
author: Sue Miklovic
sentences: “They have had a great season and hopefully they can win once more to bring home Ohio’s first Super Bowl championship and tenth NFL title!” Leave a Reply Comment *
(COLUMBUS, Ohio)—Ohio Governor Mike DeWine today(2/8/22) announced that Sunday, February 13, 2022, will be recognized as Cincinnati Bengals Day in Ohio.
“I wish the Bengals luck as they prepare to play the Los Angeles Rams this weekend,” Governor DeWine said.
